name: Fields of the Warriors (Duel Links Skill)
text: (This Skill has been adapted to work in our format, and it attempts to replicate its function in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links.)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, place this card in your Field Spell Zone and flip it over.
skill_effect: All Warrior and Beast-Warrior monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.
